amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any rule or set of rules relating to any obligation of the Federal Government with respect to tribal government or supporting tribal sovereignty and self-determination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-20 to exempt rules affecting or impacting the special government to government relationship between the federal government and tribal communities or affecting tribal sovereignty or self-determination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 229 (Roll no. 111).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 229 (Roll no. 111).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Moore.
